font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 adj. 过时的，久远的：no longer current or applicable; antiquated
【例】archaic laws
【例】Their taste and style were archaic
【近】antiquated['æntɪkwetɪd], outdated, outmoded, prehistoric, superannuated
【反】fashionable 流行的；up-to-date, fresh, modern, new, novel 新的
【派】archaism 古语：the use of archaic diction or style
【反】modern diction 新语
【记】 archae 古
